title: Garth Ennis: The Boys - Vol 01-12 (of 12|2006-12|Dgtl-HR|Empire)
description:
Overview:  <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Boys_%28comics%29" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Boys_%28comics%29</a>


Contains:


   The Boys - Vol 01, 02, 03  (Issues 001-022)  (2006-08, 2012) (Dgtl-HR)   (Empire)

   The Boys - Vol 04, 06, 07  (Issues 023-047)  (2008-10, 2012) (Dgtl-HR)   (Empire)
   The Boys - Vol 05         - Herogasm         (2009)          (Dgtl-1920) (G85King
                                                                            -Empire)

   The Boys - Vol 08         - Highland Laddie  (2010)          (Dgtl-HD)   (Empire)

   The Boys - Vol 09, 11, 12  (Issues 048-072)  (2010-12, 2012) (Dgtl-HR)   (Empire)
   The Boys - Vol 10         - Butcher Baker... (2011)          (Dgtl-HD)   (Empire)


   The series consists of 72 regular issues and 3 miniseries of 6 issues each. The
   former were collected in 9 and the latter in 3 trade editions, whose numbering
   reflects the continuity. So far, so straightforward - except that the regular
   issues were then re-collected as a 3-volume omnibus upon the series' completion,
   which is what 3 of these releases correspond to, while the other 3 are the
   original miniseries trades. Unfortunately, the organization of the omnibus
   volumes does not coincide with the continuity gaps created by said miniseries,
   which means there is no foolproof way to establish a reading order among these,
   short of disassembling the archives. Between the modifications I made to the
   original filenames, the 'pedia listing, and the narrative itself, I trust anyone
   who *isn't* a fool will be able to figure it out without much trouble, though! :P
